casebody.data:
Tonette PORTER
v.
The LOUISIANA SELF-INSURANCE FUND, Louisiana Office of Risk Management, LSU Health Science Institute of Professional Education d/b/a LSU Medical Center, and Derek Picot 2018-CC-220 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 23, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE CIVIL DISTRICT COURT FOR THE PARISH OF ORLEANS

Granted. The judgment of the district court striking Dr. Terrence Welch as an expert witness is reversed. See La. Code Civ. P. art. 1425 (C). Hughes, J., would deny the writ.
